title.heading: About Binbang
title.subline: A lighthouse that stays lit all night, so your rest never loses its way.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Booking accommodations should be exciting, not stressful. Binbang was built to free you from endless refreshing and booking wars. The moment a vacancy appears at your dream stay, we let you know first.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Add the URL of your desired accommodation from Airbnb, Agoda, and more.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Binbang checks for vacancies around the clock. Pro plans check every minute.
howItWorks.step3Desc: When a room opens up, we notify you instantly via email and KakaoTalk.

values.title: Core Values
values.v1Desc: Browser-optimized technology detects vacancies up to 4x faster.
values.v3Desc: Dynamic selectors adapt instantly to booking site changes.

cta.title: Get Started Today
cta.description: Leave the booking race to Binbang and focus on planning your next trip.
